alert.note: Alert for Callahan; Runnels; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 4:51PM CDT until May 07 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Callahan County in west central Texas... Eastern Taylor County in west central Texas... North central Runnels County in west central Texas... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 449 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Winters, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Bradshaw around 505 PM CDT. Lawn around 520 PM CDT. Tuscola around 530 PM CDT. Buffalo Gap around 535 PM CDT. Wylie, Potosi and Dudley around 545 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Lake Abilene, Drasco, Camp Tonkawa, Pumphrey and Ovalo. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
